title: Mini-Ep 219: A Change of Scenery
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 219: A Change of Scenery
itunes:subtitle: Kate prepares to gently turn 42 and Doree finds joy in personalizing book signings. Then, listeners ask about indulgent eye creams, menstrual cups vs discs vs underwear, and whether to share your birthday on Facebook. Plus, a listener calls in on their...
description:
Kate prepares to gently turn 42 and Doree finds joy in personalizing book signings. Then, listeners ask about indulgent eye creams, menstrual cups vs discs vs underwear, and whether to share your birthday on Facebook. Plus, a listener calls in on their wedding day!


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
